name: Explosive Junk
description:
Explosive Junk is a simple 2D arcade game I'm developing in my spare time.

You're a service robot, working in an disposal center for explosive waste. Following a malfunction in the automatic sorting system, the robot must manually collect the incoming waste before it explodes, and send it to the correct bin according to its type. Explosions are not the only danger though: watch out for heavy waste too!

How to play:

  • LEFT/RIGHT buttons (or arrow keys) = move the robot to the corresponding direction
  • UP button (or arrow key) = eject the held piece

PS - This is a WIP project, some features may still be missing (ex. sound fx).
